description: Any ADO provider can be read  (SqlServer, SqlServer CE 4, MySQL, SQLite, System.Data.OracleClient, ODP, Devart, PostgreSql, DB2...) into a single standard model.
releaseNotes:
* Schema Reading: when 2 tables have the same name but different schemas, the columns were mixed up. Now respects schema/owner if present.
* Schema Reading: SqlServer-Azure: Change trigger sql to not use syscomments; SQL Azure support (thanks jamesholwell, issue 1432, patch 16659)
* Schema Reading: fix AllStoredProcedures() so when called twice it does not duplicate parameters
* Schema Reading: SqlServer: when reading indexes, it correctly sets IsUnique
*  CodeGen: Simple fixing of duplicate class names
* CodeGen/ NHibernate: .net 4 projects reference the nuget package for NHibernate 4.0
summary: A simple, cross-database facade over .Net 2.0 DbProviderFactories to read database metadata.
